name: C(hinese)E(nglish)M(aths) Adventure beta trial version
description:
Students who study in primary school need to prepare for their admired secondary school. They are assigned much homework and attended many tutorials. As a result, stress is caused and affects students. It may lead bad results such as students run away from home or unwilling to study.

This game is designed for primary school students. Let them can relax during playing the game because children like playing games. Players need to answer Chinese, English and Maths questions and finish the stage mission in order to win the game. That can improve player Chinese, English and Maths ability. The message is telling the students that although it is very difficult and stressful on their study, it can help their future lives.

The game trial version will end at first boss.

C(hinese)E(nglish)M(aths) Adventure is still developing. Please look forward to it!
